doc.field: AMAX INC AMX> USES POND SYSTEM FOR MAGNESIUM

AMAX Inc unit, AMAX Magnesium Corp, said it will build a Knolls Solar Evaporation Pond System for recovery of magnesium. The company said the system will replace a previous recovery system which was flooded in 1986. The company said construction should be complete by 1988 and in full production by 1989. Reuter
